verses.verse: Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H6113>time<s%>, while he was yet shut up in the <S%H2691>court<s%> of the <S%H4307>guard<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> that <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>, Jehovah that <S%H3335>formeth<s%> it to <S%H3559>establish<s%> <S%H3068>it<s%>; Jehovah is his <S%H8034>name<s%>:
Call <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H6030>me<s%>, and I will answer <S%H5046>thee<s%>, and will show thee <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1219>things<s%>, and <S%H3045>difficult<s%>, which thou knowest not.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, concerning the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of this <S%H5892>city<s%>, and concerning the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, which are broken <S%H5422>down<s%> to make a defence against the <S%H5550>mounds<s%> and against the <S%H2719>sword<s%>;

while men <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> with the <S%H3778>Chaldeans<s%>, and to <S%H4390>fill<s%> them with the dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, whom I have <S%H5221>slain<s%> in mine <S%H639>anger<s%> and in my <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, and for all whose <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> I have <S%H5641>hid<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> from this <S%H5892>city<s%>:

Behold <S%H5927><s%>, I will bring it <S%H724>health<s%> and <S%H4832>cure<s%>, and I will <S%H7495>cure<s%> <S%H1540>them<s%>; and I will reveal unto them <S%H6283>abundance<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%>.

And I will cause the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%>, and will <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H7223>them<s%>, as at the first.

And I will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them from all their <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, whereby they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H5545>me<s%>; and I will pardon all their <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, whereby they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H6586>me<s%>, and whereby they have transgressed against me.

And this city shall be to me for a <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%>, for a <S%H8416>praise<s%> and for a <S%H8597>glory<s%>, before all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, which shall <S%H8085>hear<s%> all the <S%H2896>good<s%> that I <S%H6213>do<s%> unto <S%H6342>them<s%>, and shall fear and <S%H7264>tremble<s%> for all the <S%H2896>good<s%> and for all the <S%H7965>peace<s%> that I procure unto <S%H6213>it<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: Yet again there shall be <S%H8085>heard<s%> in this <S%H4725>place<s%>, whereof ye <S%H559>say<s%>, It is <S%H2720>waste<s%>, without <S%H120>man<s%> and without <S%H929>beast<s%>, even in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H2351>streets<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, that are <S%H8074>desolate<s%>, without <S%H120>man<s%> and without <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> and without <S%H929>beast<s%>,

the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8342>joy<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8057>gladness<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H2860>bridegroom<s%> and the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3618>bride<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H559>say<s%>, Give <S%H3034>thanks<s%> to <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>, for <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>, for his <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> endureth for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; and of them that <S%H935>bring<s%> sacrifices of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>. For I will cause the <S%H7622>captivity<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>: Yet again shall there be in this <S%H4725>place<s%>, which is <S%H2720>waste<s%>, without <S%H120>man<s%> and without <S%H929>beast<s%>, and in all the <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5116>thereof<s%>, a habitation of <S%H7462>shepherds<s%> causing their <S%H6629>flocks<s%> to lie <S%H7257>down<s%>.

In the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>, in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H8219>lowland<s%>, and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H5045>South<s%>, and in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, and in the places <S%H5439>about<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, shall the <S%H6629>flocks<s%> <S%H5674>again<s%> pass under the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of him that <S%H4487>numbereth<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, saith <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>.

Behold <S%H3117><s%>, the days <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H5002>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, that I will <S%H6965>perform<s%> that <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> which I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and concerning the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

In those <S%H3117>days<s%>, and at that <S%H6256>time<s%>, will I cause a <S%H6780>Branch<s%> of <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to grow <S%H6779>up<s%> unto <S%H1732>David<s%>; and he shall <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>.

In those <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H3063>Judah<s%> be <S%H3467>saved<s%>, and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%>; and this is the name whereby she shall be <S%H7121>called<s%>: Jehovah our <S%H3072>righteousness<s%>.

For thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: <S%H1732>David<s%> shall <S%H3808>never<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> to <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>;

neither shall the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3772>want<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H5930>burnt-offerings<s%>, and to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H5930>meal-offerings<s%>, and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> <S%H3117>continually<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came unto <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: If ye can <S%H6565>break<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3117>day<s%>, and my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3915>night<s%>, so that there shall not be <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> in their <S%H6256>season<s%>;

then may also my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> be <S%H6565>broken<s%> with <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, that he shall not have a <S%H1121>son<s%> to <S%H4427>reign<s%> upon his <S%H3678>throne<s%>; and with the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, my <S%H8334>ministers<s%>.

As the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> cannot be <S%H5608>numbered<s%>, neither the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H4058>measured<s%>; so will I <S%H7235>multiply<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that minister unto <S%H8334>me<s%>.
And the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> came to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Considerest <S%H7200><s%> thou not what this <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4940>families<s%> which <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> did <S%H977>choose<s%>, he hath cast them <S%H3988>off<s%>? thus do they <S%H5006>despise<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%>, that they should be no more a <S%H1471>nation<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>: If my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H3119>day<s%> and <S%H3915>night<s%> stand <S%H7760>not<s%>, if I have not appointed the <S%H2708>ordinances<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth<s%>;

then <S%H1571><s%> will I also cast <S%H3988>away<s%> the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and of <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, so that I will not <S%H3947>take<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to be <S%H4910>rulers<s%> over the <S%H2233>seed<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3446>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>: for I will cause their <S%H7622>captivity<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%>, and will have mercy on <S%H7355>them<s%>.
